item.title: Code Demo
item.description: Bash #!/bin/bash ###### CONFIG ACCEPTED_HOSTS="/root/.hag_accepted.conf" BE_VERBOSE=false if [ "$UID" -ne 0 ] then echo "Superuser rights required" exit 2 fi genApacheConf(){ echo -e "# Host ${HOME_DIR}$1/$2:" } JSON [ { "title": "apples", "count": [12000, 20000], "description": {"text": "...", "sensitive": false} }, { "title": "oranges", "count": [17500, null], "description": {"text": "...", "sensitive": false} } ] Rust fn main() { let greetings = ["Hello", "Hola", "Bonjour", "Ciao", "こんにちは", "안녕하세요", "Cześć", "Olá", "Здравствуйте", "Chào bạn", "您好", "Hallo", "Hej", "Ahoj", "سلام","สวัสดี"]; for (num, greeting) in greetings.
